data.message: Hello. I want to change the name of a fb-page, and there is no option to send a request, when im trying to edit the name. Im an admin. I cant find the solution in the helping center, so i hope that, you can help me. So pls help. :D

replies.message: Hey István. If you don't see the option to submit a request, it might mean you're not an admin, you or another admin submitted a request in the past or this option isn't currently available in your location. Learn more about chaining your Page name in our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/271607792873806. -Sarah

I already checked it in the help center, and read these stuffs. Im asking for help because it couldnt help me. I think not every problem can be solved by it. And if this option isnt currently available in my location then when will be? It would be important for our page to change its name. Thanks for your help.
